data.comment: The match has started at Ilha do Retiro.
Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Recife.
In the minute 5, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Internacional.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 8, Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Internacional needs to be cautious. Recife PE have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 10, Recife PE are caught offside.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Recife PE.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 19, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Recife PE pushes forward through Lucas Mugni, whose finish on goal is saved.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Internacional throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 24, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Recife PE's Lucas Mugni gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
In the minute 27, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Rodinei for Internacional gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 28, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 29, Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, Important block from the Recife PE defence as Uendel fires in a strike for Internacional.
Internacional have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Patrick puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Abel Hernandez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 36, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Free kick Recife PE.
In the minute 38, Patrick (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Internacional extend their lead to 0-2 through Abel Hernandez.
In the minute 40, That's a fine assist from Rodinei.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Internacional will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Recife PE.
In the minute 43, Goal! Marquinhos (Recife PE) scores with a header to reduce the deficit to 1-2.
Thiago Neves with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 45, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Goal kick for Internacional at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 45, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Internacional.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a first substitution, with Leandro Barcia replacing Hernane Brocador.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 49, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Internacional.
Recife PE's Adryelson has been booked in Recife.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Recife PE.
Internacional's Leandro Fernandez is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 53, Goal! Internacional extend their lead to 1-3 thanks to a Rodrigo Moledo header.
That's a fine assist from Leandro Fernandez.
In the minute 54, Internacional drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Marquinhos is booked for the home team.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 2-3 through a strike by Leandro Barcia. .
In the minute 56, Great play from Lucas Mugni to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Internacional at Ilha do Retiro.
Lucas Mugni for Recife PE has been booked by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 58, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional are whistled for offside.
Recife PE push forward at Ilha do Retiro and Marcao Silva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Internacional defence.
In the minute 60, Internacional are coming forward and Marcos Guilherme gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
The home team have replaced Ricardinho with Junior Tavares. This is the second substitution made today by Daniel Paulista.
In the minute 62, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Thiago Galhardo is on a sub for Abel Hernandez for Internacional.
In the minute 63, Internacional make their second substitution with Yuri Alberto replacing Leandro Fernandez.
In Recife Recife PE attack through Marquinhos. The finish is off target, however.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Leandro Barcia (Recife PE) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Free kick Internacional.
In the minute 67, Throw-in Internacional.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Internacional throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Recife PE drive upfield and Leandro Barcia gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Internacional defender.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team replace Rodrigo Lindoso with Rodrigo Dourado.
In the minute 71, Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Internacional's Edenilson breaks free at Ilha do Retiro. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Internacional drives forward and Yuri Alberto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
At Ilha do Retiro, Internacional are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 74, Free kick Recife PE.
Marcos Guilherme (Internacional) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
In the minute 76, Patrick puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-4.
Thiago Galhardo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 77, In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Daniel Paulista is making the team's third substitution at Ilha do Retiro with Mikael replacing Marquinhos.
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Ze Gabriel is replacing Patrick for the away team.
Yuri Alberto for Internacional drives towards goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Goal! Internacional extend their lead to 2-5 through Yuri Alberto.
Edenilson with an assist there.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Internacional.
Ronaldo is replacing Lucas Mugni for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 84, Ronaldo of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Jonathan Gomez is replacing Thiago Neves for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 86, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Junior Tavares of Recife PE smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Yuri Alberto (Internacional) has received a yellow card from Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
In the minute 88, Mikael (Recife PE) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a throw-in for Recife PE, close to Internacional's area.
Throw-in for Internacional at Ilha do Retiro.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Recife PE's Mikael gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Internacional defender.
Recife PE are pushing forward but Mikael's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 3-5.
Mikael (Recife PE) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 3-5 at Ilha do Retiro.
